summary.span: 适用于特定自定义活动（这些活动使用 方法实现执行逻辑，该方法具有对运行时功能的完全访问权限）的抽象基类。

span.span: Abstract base class for custom activities that implement execution logic using the method, which has full access to the runtime’s features.

summary.span: 创建并验证活动的自变量、变量、子活动和活动委托的说明。

span.span: Creates and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义活动作者可以在活动的 重写中提供验证逻辑。Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's override. 由 引发的任何异常不会视为验证错误。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 这些异常将从对 的调用中转义，并且必须由调用方进行处理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller.

span.span: Creates and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流运行时使用 的默认实现来确保工作流构造正确，以及管理运行时关系和生存期规则。The workflow runtime uses the default implementation of to ensure correct construction of a workflow as well as to manage run-time relationships and lifetime rules. 的默认实现使用活动类型的 来检查该类型的公共成员。The default implementation of examines the public members of the activity type using the type’s . 这些公共成员的类型包括， ， [IEnumerable\<变量 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)， ， [IEnumerable\<活动 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)，或.These public members are of type , , [IEnumerable\](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), , [IEnumerable\](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), or . 您可以重写此方法，以自定义活动的运行时说明的生成并提供自定义的验证逻辑。You can override this method to customize the building of the activity’s run-time description and to provide custom validation logic. 由 引发的任何异常不会视为验证错误。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 这些异常将从对 的调用中转义，并且必须由调用方进行处理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在一个从 继承的类中使用 CacheMetadata。The following code sample demonstrates using CacheMetadata in a class that inherits from . 此示例摘自[自定义复合使用本机活动](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-using-native-activity.md)示例。This example is from the [Custom Composite using Native Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-using-native-activity.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_CustomCompositeNativeActivity#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_customcompositenativeactivity/cs/mysequence.cs#2)]
